trans-unit.source: Identifies how to expose an interface to COM.
trans-unit.target: Identifica como expor uma interface a COM.

trans-unit.source: This enumeration works in conjunction with the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.InterfaceTypeAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: Esta enumeração funciona em conjunto com o <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.InterfaceTypeAttribute> atributo.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the interface is exposed to COM as a [dual interface](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1d39d64c-e23a-4249-a167-4369d5bd2b65), which enables both early and late binding.
trans-unit.target: Indica que a interface é exposta a COM como uma [interface dupla](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1d39d64c-e23a-4249-a167-4369d5bd2b65), que habilita a associação antecipada e tardia.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that an interface is exposed to COM as a [dispinterface](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e8c18ae5-3d9e-4dff-aa20-b5acc723eacf), which enables late binding only.
trans-unit.target: Indica que a interface é exposta a COM como uma [dispinterface](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e8c18ae5-3d9e-4dff-aa20-b5acc723eacf), que habilita somente a associação tardia.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that an interface is exposed to COM as a [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] interface.
trans-unit.target: Indica que uma interface é exposta a COM como uma interface [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Indicates that an interface is exposed to COM as an interface that is derived from [IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003), which enables only early binding.
trans-unit.target: Indica que uma interface é exposta a COM como uma interface derivada de [IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003), o que habilita somente a associação antecipada.
